TopicTitle: After successful flight i can not click any buildings

Articles.Content:
KSP: Windows - Steam

Problem: Though i can click the exit to menu button after a successful flight i can not click any of the buildings. I do not think its a problem with the mod installed though i do have a mod installed.

Mods: MechJob

Reproduction steps: Ive tried with the S-10 Hypothesis, take the ship for a flight succesfully land and click retrieve vessle, close the flight report and you cant click any buildings.

Output Log: output_log.txt
